Real Results from Real Clients

Case Studies

See how Chicago businesses are using custom AI to transform their operations.

12-Person Professional Services Firm

Team struggling to leverage AI effectively

Solution

Custom AI tool + hands-on workshop

Implemented a custom AI enterprise tool (ChatGPT workspace) for the team, then hosted an AI workshop where team members shared ideas on leveraging AI. I showed them how to turn those ideas into custom projects, which they built and deployed—now saving significant time daily.

Result

Team built custom AI projects saving hours daily

100% adoption

Mid-Size Consulting Firm

Hours wasted manually creating SOWs

Solution

AI-powered SOW generator with templates

Built a custom SOW (Statement of Work) generator. Created templates for their common project types, infused them into a custom AI tool, and configured it to generate professional SOWs from simple inputs. What took hours now takes minutes.

Result

90% reduction in SOW creation time

90% faster

Instant Lead Response AI

Every form fill gets an intelligent, personalized reply within 5 minutes—24/7. Your prospects feel heard immediately.

AI analyzes inquiry intent and crafts contextual responses

AI Meeting Prepper

Document Intelligence

Automatically extract data from PDFs, emails, and forms directly into your CRM or spreadsheets.

BH

Hi, I'm Blake

Founder, Flowstate AI

After multiple years as a technology consultant building solutions for large clients, I saw firsthand how AI could transform businesses. But I noticed small businesses were being left behind—they couldn't afford enterprise consultants or didn't know where to start.

I started Flowstate AI to bring that same enterprise-grade AI expertise to Chicago's small businesses. I have a vision for what the future of AI will be, and I want to help our local communities take advantage of this technology.

We don't sell software. We build AI systems that become your competitive advantage.

Frequently Asked Questions

Will this work with my existing tools?

Yes. We integrate with the tools you already use—Gmail, Slack, HubSpot, Salesforce, QuickBooks, and hundreds more. We design automations around your current workflow, not the other way around.

What if I don't know what to automate?

That's exactly what our free AI audit is for. We'll analyze your workflow and identify the 2-3 highest-impact opportunities. Most business owners are surprised by how much time they can reclaim.

Do I need technical knowledge?

Not at all. We handle all the technical work. You tell us what you want to achieve, and we build it. We'll train you on how to use it, but you don't need to understand the underlying technology.

How long does implementation take?

Most automations are delivered in 5-7 business days. Complex multi-step systems may take 2-3 weeks. We'll give you a clear timeline during our discovery call.

What if it doesn't work as expected?

We offer a 30-day optimization guarantee. If the automation isn't performing as promised, we'll keep refining it at no additional cost until it meets the agreed-upon specifications.
